channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned flyposting banner on railings at junction, 2nd July
item.description:
A large flyposted banner has been clearly abandoned and hanging from railings at junction before turning right into Gallagher Retail Park (going west) Also rubbish strewn all along the west-bound verge of this road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposting on roundabout mid-reservation, 2nd July
item.description:
Flyposting on mid-reservation of carriageway going east, right at the roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: MacDonald's litter and other in hedge, 2nd July
item.description:
Has been here for a month or so. I hoped it would be picked up in regular clean but I figure this doesn't happen anymore?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15a, Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights timing wrong. 20 minute delays at 6:45am, 2nd July
item.description:
Junction of B4063 and Commerce Road and half a mile in either direction from this junction due to the build up of traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
